localised_description: Arkhan’s mastery of the dread art of necromancy is superior to even that of his fellow Mortarchs. He is so steeped in deathly sorcery that his presence bolsters and invorgates his forces.
Long-dead destriers, awakened to serve their Unliving masters far beyond death.
Grave Guard are the elite warriors of tomb and barrow
Arkhan oversaw the preparations for the Great Necromancer’s return and once again he is at the forefront of his master's schemes for domination.
